newsitem.title: TURKEY: MP resigns from Turkish coalition party.
newsitem.headline: MP resigns from Turkish coalition party.

text.p: A Turkish MP from the secularist wing of the Islamist-led coalition resigned on Saturday, Anatolian news agency said.
It said Ilhan Akuzum, an MP from Deputy Prime Minister Tansu Ciller's True Path Party, became the third MP to resign from the party since Friday.
"Concerns about the coalition and its present condition tells me not to carry on with my contribution to the government," he said in his resignation letter quoted by the agency.
Senior members of the party said on Friday more resignations might come in protest at the government's Islamist leanings.
